languages.text: "Пожалуй, если под мощью вы подразумеваете бесценные знания. Что касается особых сил, дарованных душами ксеносов... Навигаторам Орселлио придется вновь столкнуться с ограничениями собственного тела и духа. Однако меня не пугает подобное, ибо наш род и наш ген никогда не были слабы. Дом Орселлио справится, и вскоре мы воспрянем вновь, окутанные золотом и белизной!"

traits.locale_text: "Пожалуй, если под мощью вы подразумеваете бесценные знания. Что касается особых сил, дарованных душами ксеносов... Навигаторам Орселлио придется вновь столкнуться с ограничениями собственного тела и духа. Однако меня не пугает подобное, ибо наш род и наш ген никогда не были слабы. Дом Орселлио справится, и вскоре мы воспрянем вновь, окутанные золотом и белизной!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, если под мощью вы подразумеваете бесценные знания. Что касается особых сил, дарованных душами ксеносов... Навигаторам Орселлио придется вновь столкнуться с ограничениями собственного тела и духа. Однако меня не пугает подобное, ибо наш род и наш ген никогда не были слабы. Дом Орселлио справится, и вскоре мы воспрянем вновь, окутанные золотом и белизной!"

However, I am undaunted by the prospect; for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, shrouded in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “如果你说的‘力量’指的是无价的知识，那我想是的。至于异形的灵魂所赋予的特殊力量……奥赛罗家族的导航者将不得不再次挑战身体与精神的极限。不过，我对这样的前景毫不畏惧，因为我们的家族与我们的基因从不孱弱。奥赛罗家族一定能做得到。用不了多久，我们就会再度崛起，在白色与金色的光辉中远航！”
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你说的‘力量’指的是无价的知识，那我想是的。至于异形的灵魂所赋予的特殊力量……奥塞罗家族的导航者将不得不再次挑战身体与精神的极限。不过，我对这样的前景毫不畏惧，因为我们的家族与我们的基因从不孱弱。奥塞罗家族一定能做得到。用不了多久，我们就会再度崛起，在白色与金色的光辉中远航！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

languages.text: «Supongo, si cuando habla de poder se refiere a un saber de valor incalculable. En cuanto a los poderes especiales otorgados por las almas xenos... los Navegantes de la casa Orsellio tendrán que apañárselas con sus limitaciones corporales y espirituales. No me asusta la posibilidad, ya que nuestro linaje y nuestros genes nunca han sido débiles. ¡La casa Orsellio triunfará y resurgirá, ataviada en blanco y dorado!».
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: «Supongo, si cuando habla de poder se refiere a un saber de valor incalculable. En cuanto a los poderes especiales otorgados por las almas xenos... los Navegantes de la casa Orsellio tendrán que apañárselas con sus limitaciones corporales y espirituales. No me asusta la posibilidad, ya que nuestro linaje y nuestros genes nunca han sido débiles. ¡La casa Orsellio triunfará y resurgirá, ataviada en blanco y dorado!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「力が貴重な知識を意味するのであれば、そうであるかもしれませんね。異種族の魂によって与えられた特別な力については…オーセリオ家の航宙士たちは、再び自らの肉体と精神の限界と戦わなければならないでしょう。ですが、私はその予感に臆することはありません。我々の血統と遺伝子は決して弱いものではありませんから。オーセリオ家は成功し、やがて我々は白と金の衣をまとって再び立ち上がるでしょう！」
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: 「力が貴重な知識を意味するのであれば、そうであるかもしれませんね。異種族の魂によって与えられた特別な力については…オーセリオ家の航宙士たちは、再び自らの肉体と精神の限界と戦わなければならないでしょう。ですが、私はその予感に臆することはありません。我々の血統と遺伝子は決して弱いものではありませんから。オーセリオ家は成功し、やがて我々は白と金の衣をまとって再び立ち上がるでしょう！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, wenn Ihr damit unschätzbar wertvolles Wissen meint. Was die speziellen Kräfte angeht, welche die Xenos-Seelen verleihen ... die Navigatoren von Haus Orsellio werden wieder mit ihren eigenen körperlichen und spirituellen Grenzen zurechtkommen müssen. Mir macht dieser Gedanke jedoch keine Angst, denn unsere Linie und unsere Gene waren noch nie schwach. Haus Orsellio wird Erfolg haben, und bald werden wir uns wieder erheben, in Weiß und Gold gehüllt!"
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, wenn Ihr damit unschätzbar wertvolles Wissen meint. Was sie speziellen Kräfte angeht, welche die Xenos-Seelen verleihen ... die Navigatoren von Haus Orsellio werden wieder mit ihren eigenen körperlichen und spirituellen Grenzen zurechtkommen müssen. Mir macht dieser Gedanke jedoch keine Angst, denn unsere Linie und unsere Gene waren noch nie schwach. Haus Orsellio wird Erfolg haben, und bald werden wir uns wieder erheben, in Weiß und Gold gehüllt!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'imagine que l'on peut dire cela, oui, si par "puissance" vous entendez d'inestimables connaissances. Quant aux pouvoirs octroyés par les âmes xénos... Désormais, les navigateurs de la maison Orsellio vont devoir se contenter de leurs propres ressources spirituelles et corporelles, et des limites qui vont avec. Je sais cependant que nous relèverons ce défi avec brio, car notre lignée et nos gènes n'ont jamais été faibles. La maison Orsellio triomphera et bientôt, nous nous relèverons, drapés de blanc et d'or ! »
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que l'on peut dire cela, oui, si par "puissance" vous entendez d'inestimables connaissances. Quant aux pouvoirs octroyés par les âmes xénos... Désormais, les navigateurs de la maison Orsellio vont devoir se contenter de leurs propres ressources spirituelles et corporelles, et des limites qui vont avec. Je sais cependant que nous relèverons ce défi avec brio, car notre lignée et nos gènes n'ont jamais été faibles. La maison Orsellio triomphera et bientôt, nous nous relèverons, drapés de blanc et d'or ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Güçten kastın paha biçilemez bilgilerse öyle de denebilir sanırım. Zenoların ruhlarının bahşettiği özel güçlere gelecek olursak... Orsellio Hanesi Rotacıları, bir kez daha kendi fiziki ve ruhani noksanlıklarıyla yüzleşmeli. Neyse ki bu düşünce beni korkutmuyor. Zira soyumuz ve genlerimiz asla güçsüz olmamıştır. Orsellio Hanesi, bu işten alnının akıyla çıkıp yeniden yükselecek!"
languages.original_text: "I suppose so, if by power you mean priceless knowledge. As for the special powers granted by the xenos souls... the Navigators of House Orsellio will once again have to contend with their own bodily and spiritual limitations. However, I am undaunted by the prospect, for our line and our gene have never been weak. House Orsellio will succeed, and soon we will rise again, draped in white and gold!"

traits.locale_text: "Güçten kastın paha biçilemez bilgilerse, öyle de denebilir sanırım. Zenoların ruhlarının bahşettiği özel güçlere gelecek olursak... Orsellio Hanesi Rotacıları, bir kez daha kendi fiziki ve ruhani noksanlıklarıyla yüzleşmeli. Neyse ki bu düşünce beni korkutmuyor çünkü soyumuz ve genlerimiz asla güçsüz olmamıştır. Orsellio Hanesi bu işten alnının akıyla çıkıp yeniden yükselecek!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
